attributes.action: The same financial support should be offered to those who are self employed!
attributes.additional_details: Funding for small and new businesses for the self employed, everyone should be treated the same and its not fair everyone else seems to be entitled to some sort help but us! We're in this together!
attributes.background: I want financial support for the self employed just like other workers are getting, as its just not fair that new businesses or business that haven't got so many years worth of tax are being penalised with no help whatsoever! Even local councils are not willing to help, its disgusting!
